name: TriggerNewBuild
description: Trigger a new Build in the same or other project.
author: Jihed Mhadhbi

inputs.name: connection
inputs.label: Build Api Access
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Build Api Access endPoint connection that you created.

inputs.name: collectionName
inputs.label: Collection Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: For VSTS use the default value : DefaultCollection. For TFS choose your collection if it's different.

inputs.name: project
inputs.label: Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the name of the team project.

inputs.name: buildDefinition
inputs.label: Build Definition
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the name of the Build to trigger.

messages.couldNotFindServerUrl: Could not find the server url.
messages.authorizationSchemeNotSupported: The authorization scheme %s is not supported for this endPoint.
